Iowa State College of Agriculture
and Mechanic Arts
Ames* Iowa
November 5* 1957
Dr0 Burton Paulu , President
NAEB
Eddy Hall
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burtons
***I returned to Des Moines on the same plane with
John Schwarzwalder. He is less than happy with NAEB
and seems Inclined not to renew KTCA membership
when it falls due* As near as I could gather, his
objections are the same as those of other community
ETV members, namely that NAEB is primarily a radio
station organization and has little to offer TV-only
members. I assured him his objection was not falling
on deaf ears and that we were in fact working toward
a solution to that feeling. I asked him to put his
beefs in writing and assured him I would carry them
to the next meeting. This he agreed to do immediately
upon his return from Duluth. I should be hearing
from him before the week is out, and will provide
you with a copy of his protests if you wish.
At the moment it looks like we might have another
Pittsburgh situation on our hands. I think we
should do everything within our power to avoid it.
Since this one is in your backyard, you probably
have a good deal more information on it than I do.
I would appreciate any filling-in you can give me.
1*11 be happy to carry the ball on it, especially
if it will relieve you of possible local embarrassment.***
Best regards,
s/ Dick
Richard P. Vogl
Director, Region IV
RFVset
cc* Dr. Harry J. Skornia
